description: This class serves as a global exception handler for the chess game backend, mapping specific exceptions to HTTP responses with a consistent error response format. It is scoped to the application's main package to avoid intercepting framework or documentation endpoints.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A Spring REST controller advice that provides centralized exception handling for the application, specifically for game resource not found errors and invalid input/turn exceptions.

methods.name: body
methods.description: Constructs a ResponseEntity with a JSON body containing timestamp, status, error, and message for the given HTTP status and message.

methods.name: handleNotFound
methods.description: Handles GameNotFoundException, returning a 404 Not Found response with error details.

methods.name: handleBadRequest
methods.description: Handles exceptions such as InvalidMoveException, NotYourTurnException, and IllegalArgumentException, returning a 400 Bad Request response with error details.
